hypothesis_content.title: Regime Transition False Positive: Volume Divergence Detection
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC shows price action suggesting regime transition (break of key 30-day level) but volume declines below 0.8x 30-day average during the break, and funding rates remain neutral (±0.005%), the probability of failed transition exceeds 65%, creating short-term reversal opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Valid regime transitions require institutional participation evidenced by volume. Low-volume breaks during neutral funding suggest market-maker activity or illiquid moves. The current regulatory news cycle creates noise that generates false technical signals.
entry_conditions: BTC breaks 30-day high or low (potential regime change signal)
No corresponding move in gold (|correlation| < 0.3 over 5 days)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to pre-break range (false break confirmed)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volume expands >1.5x average on follow-through day
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days if price remains outside range without volume confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of low-volume breaks see volume surge on day 2-3 and price continues in break direction for 5+ days.
